title: Application Containerization and Microservice Orchestration
description: In this tutorial we will learn about basic application containerization using Docker and running various components of an application as microservices.

meta.title: Containerization and Microservices with Docker | Programming Tutorial
meta.description: Learn about basic application containerization using Docker and running various components of an application as microservices. Utilize Docker Compose for orchestration during development.
meta.keywords: Docker, Containerization, Microservices, Docker Compose, Programming Tutorial, Application Development
